items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Return a user script task instance given a URL for a script file.

items.name: var scriptURL: URL
items.desc: The URL of the script file.

items.name: func execute(completionHandler: NSUserScriptTask.CompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Executes the script with no input and ignoring any result.

items.name: typealias NSUserScriptTask.CompletionHandler
items.desc: Implement this block to retrieve the error of the script executed by execute(completionHandler:).
